Today in Pembrokeshire, surf is fun at 2 ft @10s SW with light 8 mph SSW winds. Best spots include Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay, both offering clean conditions on the mid-tide push. Tomorrow, expect a slight increase to 3 ft @8s WSW with moderate 10 mph SW winds, keeping it lively across the beaches. The day after holds steady at 3 ft @11s WSW, with similar winds, providing great opportunities at all the usual spots. Best: tomorrow.
